name: meteor-typescript-bootstrap
description: A project which contains the bare bones of a Meteor app based on typescript.

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:public
scripts.build:css: cssnext templates/exports.css build/client/templates.css && cssnext css/exports.css build/client/main.css
scripts.build:html: cp -r templates/**.html build/client && cp -r html/**.html build/client
scripts.build:ts: npm run build:tsshared && npm run build:tsclient && npm run build:tsserver
scripts.clean: rimraf build/server build/client build/lib build/public build/shared build/public && mkdirp build/public
scripts.setup: cd build && meteor create tmp && cp -r tmp/.meteor . && meteor remove insecure autopublish && meteor add accounts-ui accounts-google

author: Paul Shirley
